segment.source: The Channels and conversions report in the Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you see how customers on Windows 10 have arrived at your app's listing.
segment.target: The Channels and conversions report in the Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you see how customers on Windows 10 have arrived at your app's listing.

segment.source: Channels and conversions report
segment.target: Channels and conversions report

segment.source: Channels and conversions report
segment.target: Channels and conversions report

segment.source: The Channels and conversions report in the Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you see how customers on Windows 10 have arrived at your app's listing.
segment.target: The Channels and conversions report in the Windows Dev Center dashboard lets you see how customers on Windows 10 have arrived at your app's listing.

segment.source: It lets you track custom promotion campaigns for your app or its IAPs, and see how many of those visits resulted in new acquisitions.
segment.target: It lets you track custom promotion campaigns for your app or its IAPs, and see how many of those visits resulted in new acquisitions.

segment.source: You can view this data in your dashboard, or download the report to view offline.
segment.target: You can view this data in your dashboard, or download the report to view offline.

segment.source: Important This report only shows page view and conversion data from customers on Windows 10.
segment.target: Important This report only shows page view and conversion data from customers on Windows 10.

segment.source: In this report, a channel refers to the method in which a customer arrived at your app's listing page (for example, browsing and searching in the Store, a link from an external website, a link from one of your custom campaigns, etc.).
segment.target: In this report, a channel refers to the method in which a customer arrived at your app's listing page (for example, browsing and searching in the Store, a link from an external website, a link from one of your custom campaigns, etc.).

segment.source: The following channel types are included:
segment.target: The following channel types are included:

segment.source: Store traffic: The customer was browsing or searching within the Store when they viewed your app's listing.
segment.target: Store traffic: The customer was browsing or searching within the Store when they viewed your app's listing.

segment.source: External website: The customer followed a link (without any custom campaign ID) to your app's listing from a website.
segment.target: External website: The customer followed a link (without any custom campaign ID) to your app's listing from a website.

segment.source: Search engine: The customer followed a link to your app's listing that was returned by an online search engine.
segment.target: Search engine: The customer followed a link to your app's listing that was returned by an online search engine.

segment.source: Custom campaign: The customer followed a link that used a custom campaign ID.
segment.target: Custom campaign: The customer followed a link that used a custom campaign ID.

segment.source: A page view means that a customer viewed your app's Store listing page, either via the web-based Store or from within the Store app on Windows 10.
segment.target: A page view means that a customer viewed your app's Store listing page, either via the web-based Store or from within the Store app on Windows 10.

segment.source: A conversion means that a customer has newly obtained a license to your app (whether you charged money or you've offered it for free) or to an IAP.
segment.target: A conversion means that a customer has newly obtained a license to your app (whether you charged money or you've offered it for free) or to an IAP.

segment.source: Note Conversion data is provided only for your custom campaigns.
segment.target: Note Conversion data is provided only for your custom campaigns.

segment.source: For other channel types, only page view data is currently included in this report.
segment.target: For other channel types, only page view data is currently included in this report.

segment.source: Apply filters
segment.target: Apply filters

segment.source: Near the top of the page, you can expand Apply filters to filter all of the data on this page by date range and/or by market.
segment.target: Near the top of the page, you can expand Apply filters to filter all of the data on this page by date range and/or by market.

segment.source: Date: The default filter is Last 30 days, but you can expand this up to Last 12 months.
segment.target: Date: The default filter is Last 30 days, but you can expand this up to Last 12 months.

segment.source: Market: The default setting is All markets.
segment.target: Market: The default setting is All markets.

segment.source: You can choose a specific market if you want this page to only show details from customers in that market.
segment.target: You can choose a specific market if you want this page to only show details from customers in that market.

segment.source: Device type: The default filter is All devices.
segment.target: Device type: The default filter is All devices.

segment.source: You can choose a specific device type if you want this page to only show data from customers using that type of device.
segment.target: You can choose a specific device type if you want this page to only show data from customers using that type of device.

segment.source: The info in all of the charts listed below will reflect the period of time selected in the Apply filters section, and will reflect any other filters you've chosen here.
segment.target: The info in all of the charts listed below will reflect the period of time selected in the Apply filters section, and will reflect any other filters you've chosen here.

segment.source: App page views and conversions by channel
segment.target: App page views and conversions by channel

segment.source: The App page views and conversions by channel chart shows how often your app's listing page was viewed and how customers arrived there.
segment.target: The App page views and conversions by channel chart shows how often your app's listing page was viewed and how customers arrived there.

segment.source: It also shows the number of conversions from custom campaigns over the selected period of time.
segment.target: It also shows the number of conversions from custom campaigns over the selected period of time.

segment.source: The Page views tab of this chart shows the number of times your app's listing page was viewed over the selected period of time.
segment.target: The Page views tab of this chart shows the number of times your app's listing page was viewed over the selected period of time.

segment.source: Views are grouped according to the type of channel by which the customer found your app's listing.
segment.target: Views are grouped according to the type of channel by which the customer found your app's listing.

segment.source: The Conversions tab of this chart shows the number of conversions (new acquisitions) over the selected period of time for customers who arrived at your app's listing via a custom campaign.
segment.target: The Conversions tab of this chart shows the number of conversions (new acquisitions) over the selected period of time for customers who arrived at your app's listing via a custom campaign.

segment.source: Note For info about all of your app's acquisitions, including those that did not occur via a custom campaign link and those from customers on other OS versions, see the Acquisitions report.
segment.target: Note For info about all of your app's acquisitions, including those that did not occur via a custom campaign link and those from customers on other OS versions, see the Acquisitions report.

segment.source: Campaign performance by channel
segment.target: Campaign performance by channel

segment.source: The Campaign performance by channel chart shows the number of page views for each channel type.
segment.target: The Campaign performance by channel chart shows the number of page views for each channel type.

segment.source: It also shows the total number of app and IAP conversions from your custom campaigns during the selected period of time.
segment.target: It also shows the total number of app and IAP conversions from your custom campaigns during the selected period of time.

segment.source: App page views and conversions by campaign ID
segment.target: App page views and conversions by campaign ID

segment.source: The App page views and conversions by campaign ID chart shows the number of page views and conversions for each of your specific campaign IDs during the selected period of time.
segment.target: The App page views and conversions by campaign ID chart shows the number of page views and conversions for each of your specific campaign IDs during the selected period of time.

segment.source: IAP conversions by campaign ID
segment.target: IAP conversions by campaign ID

segment.source: The IAP conversions by campaign ID chart shows the number of IAP conversions per custom campaign ID.
segment.target: The IAP conversions by campaign ID chart shows the number of IAP conversions per custom campaign ID.

segment.source: When an app install is counted as a conversion for a custom campaign, any IAP purchases in that app are also counted as conversions for the same custom campaign.
segment.target: When an app install is counted as a conversion for a custom campaign, any IAP purchases in that app are also counted as conversions for the same custom campaign.

segment.source: By default, the report includes any IAP which had a conversion that resulted from a link using a custom campaign ID during the selected period of time.
segment.target: By default, the report includes any IAP which had a conversion that resulted from a link using a custom campaign ID during the selected period of time.

segment.source: To view data for a specific IAP, select it from the Section filters.
segment.target: To view data for a specific IAP, select it from the Section filters.

segment.source: Conversions breakdown
segment.target: Conversions breakdown

segment.source: The Conversions breakdown chart shows more details about the page views that resulted from each of your channel types.
segment.target: The Conversions breakdown chart shows more details about the page views that resulted from each of your channel types.

segment.source: Click each channel type to get more info about conversions from that channel:
segment.target: Click each channel type to get more info about conversions from that channel:

segment.source: Custom campaign: Shows the specific campaign IDs.
segment.target: Custom campaign: Shows the specific campaign IDs.

segment.source: External website: Shows the domain of the website that linked to the app.
segment.target: External website: Shows the domain of the website that linked to the app.

segment.source: Store traffic: Shows whether the customer was using the Store client app or the online Store.
segment.target: Store traffic: Shows whether the customer was using the Store client app or the online Store.

segment.source: Search engine: Shows the specific search terms used by the customer.
segment.target: Search engine: Shows the specific search terms used by the customer.

segment.source: For custom campaigns, you can also see the number of app conversions and IAP conversions which resulted from each specific campaign ID.
segment.target: For custom campaigns, you can also see the number of app conversions and IAP conversions which resulted from each specific campaign ID.
